title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 16.15 - Sales of personal property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 16.15 - Sales of personal property

State Regulations

Personal property sold pursuant to section 178 of the State

Finance Law shall be clearly identified on the agency's property records in
order that such disposition may be readily audited by the

Comptroller. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
16.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
